info.author: Samson Danziger

info.description:
==================
FanFiction.net API
==================

Features
--------

* Gather story, chapter and user information
* Download stories to pdf, epub, mobi and txt
* Gather stories, favourites, and favourite authors of a user.
* Login Sessions
* Full command line functionality
  * Help file
  * Download multiple stories
  * Download from file(s)
  * Download to different formats
  * Specify output directory

Planned features
----------------

* Filter and search effectively

Setup
-----

To setup, clone or download the zip, then run `python setup.py install`, from the root directory.

Alternatively the package is available at `pypi <https://pypi.python.org/pypi/fanfiction-api>`_.
To install run ``pip install  fanfiction-api``

If authentication is going to be used, the program expects to see the file ``$HOME/.ffconf.yaml``, which should contain your fanfiction.net details. If no config file is specified, and this one does not exist, it will be created.

``#$HOME/.ffconf.yaml``

``username:``

``email:``

``password:``


Dependencies
------------

* `Beautiful Soup 4 <http://www.crummy.com/software/BeautifulSoup/>`_
* `PyYAML <http://pyyaml.org/wiki/PyYAMLDocumentation>`_
* `pdfkit <https://pypi.python.org/pypi/pdfkit>`_
* `ebooklib <https://pypi.python.org/pypi/EbookLib/0.15>`_
* `requests <https://pypi.python.org/pypi/requests>`_
* `KindleGen <http://www.amazon.com/gp/feature.html?docId=1000765211>`_

Changelog
=========

1.1
---
* Add authentication
* Add better configuration control

1.0
---
* Gather stories and users
* Download to various formats
* Full command line argument parsing
info.name: fanfiction-api
